name: Gnome Squidling
languages: understands Deep Speech and Gnomish but can\'t speak
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Magic Resistance: The squidling has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Tentacles: Melee Weapon Attack: +0+1d4 - 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (2d4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 7+1d4 + 5) and must succeed on a DC 7+1d4 + 5 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.
actions.Extract Brain: Melee Weapon Attack: +0+1d4 - 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature grappled by the squidling. Hit: 27 (5d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the squidling kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.
actions.Mind Tickle (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The squidling magically emits psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 7+1d4 + 5 Intelligence saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage and be stunned until the end of its next turn.
